data.lyric:
[ti:IDGAF]
[ar:Dua Lipa]
[al:Dua Lipa (Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]IDGAF (Explicit) - Dua Lipa
[00:02.78]Written by：Dua Lipa/Larzz Principato/Mnek/Skyler Stonestreet/Whiskey Waters
[00:05.56]You call me all friendly
[00:07.43]
[00:08.04]Tellin' me how much you miss me
[00:10.43]That's funny I guess you've heard my songs
[00:14.15]
[00:14.80]Well I'm too busy for your business
[00:17.26]
[00:17.83]Go find a girl who wants to listen
[00:19.70]
[00:20.32]Cause if you think I was born yesterday
[00:22.26]You have got me wrong
[00:23.73]
[00:24.40]So I cut you off
[00:25.78]I don't need your love
[00:27.07]
[00:27.97]Cause I already cried enough
[00:29.61]I've been done
[00:30.15]
[00:30.91]I've been movin' on since we said goodbye
[00:33.46]
[00:34.45]I cut you off
[00:35.13]
[00:35.69]I don't need your love so you can try all you want
[00:39.81]
[00:40.63]Your time is up I'll tell you why
[00:43.07]
[00:44.41]You say you're sorry
[00:45.98]
[00:46.76]But it's too late now
[00:48.36]
[00:49.49]So save it get gone shut up
[00:52.15]
[00:54.55]Cause if you think I care about you now
[00:58.31]
[00:59.47]Well boy I don't give a f**k
[01:02.10]
[01:04.93]I remember that weekend
[01:06.70]
[01:07.34]When my best friend caught you creepin'
[01:09.16]
[01:09.78]You blamed it all on the alcohol
[01:13.23]
[01:13.95]So I made my decision
[01:16.66]
[01:17.24]Cause you made your bed sleep in it
[01:19.22]
[01:19.75]Play the victim and switch your position
[01:21.90]I'm through I'm done
[01:23.11]

[02:26.97]

[02:32.36]

[02:38.07]
